member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Produces an identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(mat2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix by copying a given source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given scalar value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(mat3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given mat3 source matrix (3x3). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(Unigine.mat4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given mat4 source matrix (4x4). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(Unigine.dmat4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given dmat4 source matrix (3x4). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given pointer to the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(Unigine.vec2,Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix by given two vec2 vectors.
member.param: Source vector for the first column.
Source vector for the second column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(float,float,float,float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix with given float values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(float,float,float,float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix with given constant float values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.#ctor(float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix with the given float value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.set(float)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a pointer to the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.set(mat2)
member.summary: Sets the matrix equal to the specified source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.set(mat3)
member.summary: Sets the matrix using a given mat3 source matrix (3x3). Values m00, m01, m10, m11 from the source matrix are used.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.set(Unigine.mat4)
member.summary: Sets the matrix using a given mat4 source matrix (4x4). Values m00, m01, m10, m11 from the source matrix are used.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.set(Unigine.dmat4)
member.summary: Sets the matrix using a given dmat4 source matrix (3x4). Values m00, m01, m10, m11 from the source matrix are used.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.set(int,int,float)
member.summary: Sets a new value of the matrix element specified by row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.get
member.summary: Returns the pointer to the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.get const
member.summary: Returns the constant pointer to the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.get(float) const
member.summary: Fills the destination matrix, specified by the given pointer, with matrix values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.get(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the reference to the matrix element specified by given row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.get(int,int) const
member.summary: Returns the value of the matrix element specified by given row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.setColumn(int,Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Sets the specified column of the matrix using a given vec2 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.getColumn(int) const
member.summary: Returns the specified matrix column.
member.returns: The vec2 vector with column values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.setIdentity
member.summary: Sets the matrix equal to the identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.setRotate(float)
member.summary: Fills the rotation matrix using a given angle.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.setRow(int,Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Sets the specified row of the matrix using a given vec2 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.getRow(int) const
member.summary: Returns the specified matrix row.
member.returns: The vec2 vector with row values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.setScale(Unigine.vec2)
member.summary: Fills the scaling matrix using a given vec2 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat2.setZero
member.summary: Sets all matrix elements equal to 0.

member.summary: Performs type conversion to const float *.

member.summary: Performs type conversion to float *.

member.summary: Performs type conversion to void *.

member.summary: Performs matrix assignment. Destination matrix = Source matrix.
